Name: Ahmed
description: Ahmed is a hardworking man who tries his utmost to provide his family with a decent life. He is a 31-years-old, a father of one adorable kid, living with his family in a village near Jenin, West Bank. He works in the public sector where he earns a low income, this income is barely cover all the family needs. He also works in beekeeping, it's a good source of income for him. He went to Palestine for Credit and Development FATEN to request a loan to buy beehives for his work. He hopes you will help by funding his loan.
